app.title: Drones and 3D Printing
app.subtitle: A modern Angular application with MVC architecture

droneGame.title: Collect Drone Parts
droneGame.instructions: Click on the floating drone parts to collect them before time runs out!

droneFrame.name: Drone Frame
droneFrame.description: Carbon fiber frame - the backbone of your FPV drone

fpvCamera.name: FPV Camera
fpvCamera.description: Small lightweight camera for first-person view

vtx.name: Video Transmitter
vtx.description: VTX - transmits video signal to your goggles

motors.name: Motors
motors.description: Brushless motors that provide power to spin the propellers

navAntenna.name: Navigation Antenna
navAntenna.description: GPS antenna for precise navigation and return-to-home

videoAntenna.name: Video Antenna
videoAntenna.description: Antenna for transmitting live video feed

hero.introduction: I, Natalia, maintain financial reports for several volunteer initiatives I'm involved in, spending not only my own funds but also those collected through community efforts.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Activities

socialDrone.title: SocialDrone
socialDrone.description: SocialDrone is a group of volunteers who build FPV drones for the Ukrainian Armed Forces with their own hands. We unite people who want to help our defenders to stop enemy in a distanse.

idea.title: Project Idea:
idea.description: An FPV drone built by your hands for ~$200 can do the job of 1 Javelin shot worth €70,000

volunteer.process: I collect donations and personal funds, purchase components, assemble drones myself, send them for testing to SocialDrone, and then they transfer them to the military.

building.title: Drone Assembly
building.description: The most interesting part is the assembly process itself. It's not as complicated as it seems at first glance. We'll teach and help you!

ordering.title: Parts Ordering
ordering.description: You can order parts from the community-provided list and find a volunteer who has time and inspiration for assembly.

donating.title: Financial Support
donating.description: You can donate for components, batteries, or any community member's fund. Every contribution matters!

stats.title: My stats so far
stats.collected: Total collected in bank and transferred in cash

volunteer.help: I'll be happy to help if you have any additional questions. Together we are stronger!
